Member Function Documentation

- (NSString * EC2InstanceState.)description  

Returns a string representation of this object; useful for testing and debugging.

- (id EC2InstanceState.)init  

Default constructor for a new object.

Callers should use the property methods to initialize this object after creating it.

Property Documentation

- (NSNumber *) code [read, write, retain]

A 16-bit unsigned integer.

The high byte is an opaque internal value and should be ignored. The low byte is set based on the state represented.

- (NSString *) name [read, write, retain]

The current state of the instance.

Constraints:
Allowed Values: pending, running, shutting-down, terminated
